actionRequired.linkSingular: Sign off on removal of {{responses}} response
actionRequired.linkPlural: Sign off on removal of {{responses}} responses

responseTemplate.errorNoQuestionsAnswers: No questions and answers were found.
responseTemplate.rowTableInfo: A row table is most useful when copy and pasting into a spreadsheet.
responseTemplate.confirmReceiptResponse: Sign off on the removal of responses
responseTemplate.confirmReceiptInfo: Copy the code below and paste it into the 'Sign off on removal with receipt codes' dialog within GC Forms.

responseAggregatedTemplate.title: Form responses
responseAggregatedTemplate.officialReceipt: Official receipt and record of responses
responseAggregatedTemplate.needToVerify: You’ll need this receipt to verify all responses made it safely from GC Forms to your computer.
responseAggregatedTemplate.useTheCopy: Use the “Copy receipt codes” button to sign off on the removal of responses from GC Forms in the Downloaded tab in GC Forms.

copyCodes.title: Sign off on removal of responses from GC Forms
copyCodes.description: Once you've checked the downloaded responses, and are ready to remove these from GC Forms, copy and paste the receipt codes. This helps us know when responses have been transferred to you so we can remove the data from our system.

dataList.title: Form responses: list of selected responses

dataClassification.retainCopy: Retain this copy in accordance to your retention policy.
